name: View naming convention - name size control
description: This rule searches for database views for which the name size is greater than X characters. The length is a parameter that can be changed at will.
output:
Associated to each DB2 view with violations, the Quality Rule provides:

rationale:
For readability aspects, naming conventions must be respected.

=> View names should not be longer than X characters.
remediation: Change name according to the naming convention
